channel.title: La Mesilla on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in La Mesilla on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-10 West Offramp at NM-28
item.description: I-10 west offramp (Exit 140) at NM-28. Turn right for NM-28 North and Ave. de Mesilla. Turn left for NM-28 south towards Historic La Mesilla.
